Attribute.Name: AllocatedLevel
Attribute.Description: Indicates the extent of allocation for the work order. The valid values are FULL, PARTIAL, NONE, and ANY. The respective values tells wether the work order is fully, partially, not allocated or is in any of the the previously mentioned states.

Description.div: Case for which the work order is processed.

Attribute.Name: MaximumRecords
Attribute.Description: Specifies maximum number of records that must be fetched.

Description.div: Pallet for which the work order is processed.

Default: N
Valid Values:
N - Returns records that satisfy the input criteria from the YFS_WORK_ORDER table.
Y - Returns records that satisfy the input criteria from the YFS_WORK_ORDER_H table (the history table).
B - Returns records that satisfy the input criteria from both YFS_WORK_ORDER and YFS_WORK_ORDER_H tables. Records returned from the current table are first in the output.

Attribute.Name: ReleasedLevel
Attribute.Description: Indicates the extent to which the work order is released. The valid values are FULL, PARTIAL, NONE, and ANY. The respective values tells wether the work order is fully, partially, not relased or is in any of the previously mentioned states.

Description.div:
This table stores information about all the components required by the work order.
Components are not mandatory for work orders created for the KITTING service item group code.
Stores details of the inventory tag attributes for work order components that are tag tracked. Tag information is stored only if the Node tracks tag information in inventory.
Case for which the activity is performed.
Pallet for which the activity is performed.
Indicates if this audit has been updated by current transaction.

Attribute.Name: DataType
Attribute.Description: Data Type of the attribute Audited

Description.div: Flag indicates if this record has been changed by this transaction
Flag indicates if this record has been changed by this transaction

The ConsiderCurrentSlot flag indicates that system should consider the available capacity of the current slots, which the current timestamp falls under.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N
The quantity requested in the work order's volume unit of measure, which is specified in the VolumeUOM field of the work order
The quantity requested in the work order's weight unit of measure, which is specified in the WeightUOM field of the work order

Attribute.Name: TransactionName
Attribute.Description: Transaction name which created the hold type.

Attribute.Name: StatusDescription
Attribute.Description: Transaction name which changed the status of the hold type.

Attribute.Name: TransactionName
Attribute.Description: Transaction name which changed the status of the hold type.
